title.rendered: “Israeli Defense Forces Launch Nighttime Strikes on Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a series of Hezbollah terror organization targets in Lebanon

During the night, the IDF attacked a series of Hezbollah terror organization targets in Lebanon.

Fighter jets from the Air Force attacked a military complex of the Hezbollah terror organization in the spacious village of Marwahin, as well as a rocket launcher and terror infrastructure in the village of Aita al-Shaab.

In the course of the passing day, a remotely manned aircraft of the Air Force attacked a launcher from which fire was carried out towards Israeli territory, and a combat helicopter attacked a space from which an anti-tank missile was launched towards Israel.

Attached is documentation of IDF attacks in Lebanon: https://bit.ly/3tIxbQG
